attributes.action: Petition to stop people doing stupid petitions on Facebook.
attributes.additional_details: It needs doing and you are the people to do it
attributes.background: Make an act of law that stops stupid petitions on facebook

rejection.details:
It is up to Facebook, not the UK Government or House of Commons, whether to allow its users to start petitions on Facebook.

We also cannot accept petitions that call for an action relating to a particular organisation outside of the UK Government or Parliament.
